title: Axis & Allies - Iron Blitz Edition
description:
This is a back-up ISO of the 1998, Hasbro Interactive, Windows XP, video game.  It was created using Ubuntu 12.04/Brasero Burning software.  The file has been tested with success, but WARNING TO THE USER: It is un-patched.  You will need to patch it yourself -> Without patching, it WILL run with glitches (mouse disappears during unit movement, etc).  This occurs on my original version of the disc as well

The Iron Blitz Edition differs from the original Axis & Allies Board game in that it has several set-up scenarios. Early 1939, Cold war, etc.

More notes here (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axis_%26_Allies_%281998_video_game%29)

Windows users can use IMGBurn OS/freeware to burn the ISO to disc
